title: 82x7: Proceedings Involving a Particular Matter and 18 U.S.C. § 207
summary: A former senior employee was not prohibited by 18 U.S.C. § 207(b) and (c) from being present in a courtroom or advising defense counsel at defense counsel’s table during proceedings involving a particular matter in which he had not personally participated but which had been under his official responsibility during his last year of government service.
